attributes.action: CCTV WOODBURN ROAD/NEWMILLS ROAD DALKEITH.  LETS PUT A STOP TO ALL THE TROUBLE/STABBINGS AT WEEKENDS.
attributes.additional_details:
I want as many signatures on this e-petition as possible, I am then going to take it to Midlothian Council and Lothian and Borders Police.

I want CCTV put up on the main road outside the entrance to Woodburn, near the Miners Club.  I am fed up with trouble nearly every weekend on the main road (old A68) next to my house.

Please sign this and pass it on to everyone you know.  Our kids should be able to grow up in a safe place.
